Multi-purpose plastic folding crate,Made of plastic, these crates are collapsible, which allows easy storage. Also, the folding crate is stackable, which gives you the freedom to make the best of available space. These crates can nest when not in use.Wholesale Various High Quality Heavy Duty Plastic Folding Crate from plastic-crate.com

The durable, lightweight collapsible storage crate offers streamlined storage at home or on-the-go.All the plastic collapsible boxes are industrial quality and not high street style products, meaning they are suitable for all end users and applications in industry, home in the garden or garage etc. The offering generally reflects our standard range of attached lid containers, stacking euro containers, stack/nest boxes, plastic parts bins and plastic bulk containers.
